smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function watcheeModel has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface WatchlistDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: TopLevelPropertyNaming
smells.description: Top level property names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Top level constant names should match the pattern: [A-Z][_A-Z0-9]*

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: drawer.getDrawerItem(R.id.home_drawer_night_mode_switch.toLong()) cannot be safely cast to SwitchDrawerItem.
parent.adapter.getItem(position) cannot be safely cast to String.
price.text cannot be safely cast to Spannable.
source cannot be safely cast to Spannable.
holder cannot be safely cast to DealItemViewHolder.
chip.tag cannot be safely cast to StoreModel.

LayoutInflater.from(activity).inflate(
                    R.layout.layout_add_to_watch_list_chip_item,
                    storesChipGroup,
                    false
                ) cannot be safely cast to Chip.
DecimalFormat.getCurrencyInstance(Locale.US) cannot be safely cast to DecimalFormat.

TestListenableWorkerBuilder.from<PriceCheckerWorker>(context, PriceCheckerWorker::class.java)
                .setWorkerFactory(GameDealzWorkManagerFactory())
                .build() cannot be safely cast to PriceCheckerWorker.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (itemsAdapter.getAdapterItem(position).tag as? ManageWatchlistModel) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: itemsAdapter.getAdapterItem(position).tag as? ManageWatchlistModel
Parentheses in (ids?.let { storesDao.all(it.toSet()) } ?: storesDao.all()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ids?.let { storesDao.all(it.toSet()) } ?: storesDao.all()

Parentheses in (ids?.let { regionWithCountriesDao.allRegions(it.toSet()) } ?: regionWithCountriesDao.allRegions()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ids?.let { regionWithCountriesDao.allRegions(it.toSet()) } ?: regionWithCountriesDao.allRegions()
Parentheses in (ids?.let { watchlistDao.findAll(it) } ?: watchlistDao.findAll()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ids?.let { watchlistDao.findAll(it) } ?: watchlistDao.findAll()

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: androidx.work.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
androidx.room.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
